I am Menno van Voorst

A passionate web developer with the drive to create the best user experience on the web.

Technologies

I have hands-on experience with the following technologies:

  • Typescript

  • Next.JS

  • React

  • Stencil

  • VueJS

  • Tailwind CSS

  • Node.JS

  • NGINX

Experience

I have worked at the companies mentioned below and gained valuable experience during my time there.

  • Saxum

    apr. 2022 - current

    As a front-end developer at the interim agency Saxum, I work on many different projects for various digital companies.

  • KPN

    apr. 2021 - current

    In the Servicetools team at KPN, I build tools that help KPN customers solve issues with their fixed devices. These complex tools were built with StencilJS and integrated in the KPN app and website.

  • PeerPep

    june. 2020 - current

    Peerpep is a company dedicated to make people move more through gaming based on physical exertion. As a front-end developer at PeerPep, my job is to design and build a portal in NextJS that users could use to create or manage competitions. In addition to coding, it is also my job to make the mobile application design in Figma and to manage the development team.

  • Ordina

    oct. 2021 - mar. 2022

    As a front-end developer at the largest IT supplier in the Benelux, I contributed to building applications for institutions such as the UMC Groningen and KWF. These applications range from developing e-commerces websites, to creating tools to help doctors with making the choice between dialysis or transplantation.

  • GoDo

    sep. 2019 - jan. 2020

    As developer I designed and developed the new website for recruitment agency GoDo to improve the customer journey and increase the total applicants on the open vacancies.

  • Tweakers

    feb. 2019 - jun. 2019

    At Tweakers I was responsible for writing A/B-tests to validate new functionalities designed by the UX team. I also set up a design library for internal use so that we could set up prototypes and designs faster.
